mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trade_event ( EVENT_ID, TRADE_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INSTRUMENT_ID, EVENT_TYPE, QUANTITY, PRICE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, STATUS, SOURCE_SYSTEM, TRADE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{eventId}, #{tradeId}, #{accountId}, #{instrumentId}, #{eventType}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{currency}, #{status}, #{sourceSystem}, #{tradeDate}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_ID, TRADE_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INSTRUMENT_ID, EVENT_TYPE, QUANTITY, PRICE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, STATUS, SOURCE_SYSTEM, TRADE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM trade_event WHERE EVENT_ID = #{eventId}

SELECT EVENT_ID, TRADE_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INSTRUMENT_ID, EVENT_TYPE, QUANTITY, PRICE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, STATUS, SOURCE_SYSTEM, TRADE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM trade_event WHERE TRADE_ID = #{tradeId}

SELECT EVENT_ID, TRADE_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INSTRUMENT_ID, EVENT_TYPE, QUANTITY, PRICE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, STATUS, SOURCE_SYSTEM, TRADE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM trade_event WHERE INSTRUMENT_ID = #{instrumentId}

SELECT EVENT_ID, TRADE_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INSTRUMENT_ID, EVENT_TYPE, QUANTITY, PRICE, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, STATUS, SOURCE_SYSTEM, TRADE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM trade_event WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}
